metadata.title: CVE-2023-52675 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:powerpc/imc-pmu: Add a null pointer check in update_events_in_group()kasprintf() returns a pointer to dynamically allocated memorywhich can be NULL upon failure.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
